name: Measure
body:
### What is the SceneSkope Measure Client?

You use the SceneSkope measure client in order to measure how engaged your customers are in your site. You modify the page to add your unique identifier and tag various pieces of content. You then include the SceneSkope measure script and measurement about individual customers are automatically reported.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
